## Description {#details}

Keep track of simplification of Phi nodes.

Accept the set of all phi nodes and erase phi node from this set if it is simplified.

Definition at line 3984 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
